relics.name: The Hat
relics.description: At the start of combat, add a card into your hand that Retains and Moves up to 3 Spaces.

relics.name: Smiley Hat
relics.description: At the start of combat, Transform a random Empty Space into a positive Space.

relics.name: Angry Hat
relics.description: At the start of combat, Transform a random negative Space into an Empty Space.
relics.flavorText: ARRRRRGH, this conflict is coming to a head.

relics.name: Sunglasses Hat
relics.description: The first time a rare Space would fade each combat, prevent it.

relics.name: Doom Hat
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
At the start of combat, Transform 4 random Empty Spaces into Doom Spaces.
relics.flavorText: I will incinerate your soul and imprison your mind in eons of pain. Also, your hair smells nice.

relics.name: Propeller Hat
relics.description: Activate the first positive Space you pass each turn.
relics.flavorText: get it, like u r flying

relics.name: Super Hat
relics.description:
Replaces The Hat.
At the start of combat, add a card into your hand that Retains and Moves any number of Spaces.
relics.flavorText: Faster than a speeding regular hat.

keywords.name: Wariomod:damage space
keywords.description: Space. Deals damage to ALL enemies.

keywords.name: Wariomod:go space
keywords.description: Space. Can't be Transformed. Deals damage to ALL enemies when landed on or passed.

keywords.name: Wariomod:kaboom space
keywords.description: Space. Adds Kabooms into your discard pile.

keywords.name: Wariomod:volcanic space
keywords.description: Space. Deals damage to a random enemy and copies itself.
